response.raw:
Here is the memo:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To: All Elementary School Staff
From: [Your Name], Senior Teacher
Date: [Current Date]
Re: Enforcing School Policies and Rules for Students

This memo is a reminder to all staff about the importance of consistently enforcing the school's policies and rules that govern student behavior. As educators, it is our responsibility to:

• Be familiar with and follow the school's code of conduct and disciplinary procedures
• Clearly communicate behavioral expectations to students in an age-appropriate way
• Closely monitor students and intervene promptly to address any misbehavior 
• Respond to violations of school rules in a fair, firm and consistent manner as outlined in the school's progressive discipline policy
• Document and report significant behavioral issues to school administration and parents as required
• Model appropriate, respectful and responsible conduct for students at all times

By holding students accountable and uniformly applying consequences for misbehavior, we maintain a positive learning environment, keep students safe, and help them develop into responsible citizens. Thank you for your diligence and cooperation in this crucial aspect of our work as elementary educators.
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
response.extracted:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To: All Elementary School Staff
From: [Your Name], Senior Teacher
Date: [Current Date]
Re: Enforcing School Policies and Rules for Students

This memo is a reminder to all staff about the importance of consistently enforcing the school's policies and rules that govern student behavior. As educators, it is our responsibility to:

• Be familiar with and follow the school's code of conduct and disciplinary procedures
• Clearly communicate behavioral expectations to students in an age-appropriate way
• Closely monitor students and intervene promptly to address any misbehavior 
• Respond to violations of school rules in a fair, firm and consistent manner as outlined in the school's progressive discipline policy
• Document and report significant behavioral issues to school administration and parents as required
• Model appropriate, respectful and responsible conduct for students at all times

By holding students accountable and uniformly applying consequences for misbehavior, we maintain a positive learning environment, keep students safe, and help them develop into responsible citizens. Thank you for your diligence and cooperation in this crucial aspect of our work as elementary educators.
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
